.
																                
																                
																                    Recurrent Acute Promyelocytic Leukemia
																                    Treatment of recurrent acute promyelocytic leukemia may include the following:         -  All-trans retinoic acid therapy (ATRA) plus chemotherapy.    -  Arsenic trioxide therapy.    -  Targeted therapy with a monoclonal antibody (gemtuzumab), if special approval is given.     -  Stem cell transplant using blood stem ce
